Question: This person wrote and starred in Shopgirl (2005), based on his own novella (2000), and starred in Cheaper by the Dozen 2.
Hints: This person performed "King Tut" on the April 22, 1978, edition of SNL.
During World War II, in England, this person's father had appeared in a production of Our Town with Raymond Massey.
"Just a wild and crazy guy" became another of this person's known catch phrases.
